name: cursor-with
description: A tiny, customizable, easy-to-use, framework-Agnostic, and beautiful cursor following effect.
author: voidis <lbh_ldu@outlook.com>

scripts.dev: pnpm --filter cursorwith-test dev && pnpm --filter cursorwith-test test
scripts.prod: pnpm --filter cursorwith-test prod && pnpm --filter cursorwith-test prod
scripts.pre-publish: pnpm --filter cursorwith-core build && pnpm --filter cursorwith-core publish --dry-run --no-git-checks
scripts.pub: pnpm --filter cursorwith-core build && pnpm --filter cursorwith-core publish --access public --no-git-checks
scripts.up-version-publish:
pnpm _version && pnpm _log && pnpm _push && pnpm _gh-release && pnpm pub && echo '

Published Successfully.

'
scripts._version: npm version patch && cd packages/cursor-with && npm version patch -m "version %s release"
